snippet: For Mitt Romney’s team, producing Hollywood-caliber events with a fraction of a film director’s time and budget has required a lot of hard work and a gift for anticipating trouble.
abstract: Mitt Romney's advance team emerges as one of consistently high-performing arms of his campaign, producing Hollywood-caliber events with fraction of a film director's time and budget; its mission is to project grandly historical images of Romney through filter of a generally uncooperative news media.
lead_paragraph: For Mitt Romney’s team, producing Hollywood-caliber events with a fraction of a film director’s time and budget has required a lot of hard work and a gift for anticipating trouble.

headline.seo: Romney’s Advance Team Tirelessly Pursues Perfection
headline.main: Romney Advance Team Works Every Angle in Pursuit of Visual Perfection
headline.print_headline: Romney Advance Team Works Every Angle in Pursuit of Visual Perfection
